title: Executive Order 7081-Revocation of Executive Order No. 6497, December 15, 1933
content: Executive Order No. 6497 of December 15, 1933, amending Executive Order No. 6247 of August 10, 1933, is hereby revoked.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7081-Revocation of Executive Order No. 6497, December 15, 1933 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/375216
